text: pinnit avarkkupirake avarute pingamikalayi oru vibhagam vannu. avar vedagrantham anantarametuttu. i adhamaleakattinre vibhavannalan avar sekhariccukeantirikkunnat. â€œnannalkk iteakke pearuttukittuâ€menn avar parayukayum ceyyunnu. attarattilulla aihikavibhavannal vintum vannukittiyal atavar varippunarum. allahuvinre peril satyamallateannum parayukayillenn vedagranthattilute avareat karar vannukayum atilullat avar pathiccariyukayum ceytittille? paraleaka bhavanaman bhakti pularttunnavarkk uttamam. ninnal aleaciccariyunnille
